item.title: Analysis of Movies - IMDB Dataset
item.description: Movies One of my absolute favourite things to do during my pastime is to sit down with my family and friends on a couch and put on a visually mesmerizing, thought provoking movie, with beer and popcorn flowing of course. Thus, I am extremely interested in analyzing movies and understanding all the different factors that come into play in the movie industry. Here, we will look in detail into the different genres of movies from IMDB, and analyze key figures such as their budget, ratings and gross earnings.

item.title: Climate Change
item.description: Climate Change is the defining issue of our time and we are at the defining moment of our lives. The scope of the impacts of climate change are global and unprecedented in scale and it is our duty to take drastic action today to do as much as we can to protect our environment and keep our planet healthy. Climate Change: What does the data say? To this day, there are still many that deny the effect of climate change.

item.title: Yield Curve Analysis
item.description: The Yield Curve The Yield Curve is simply the difference between short and long-term interest rates. It is important in the world of finance not only because it is used as a benchmark for other debt in the market, such as mortgages or bank lending rates, but also because it can be used to predict changes in economic output and overall growth. Here, we will download and attempt to analyze historical US yield rates of diffent maturities.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
